title: Isle of Dogs
plot: An outbreak of dog flu has spread through the city of Megasaki, Japan, and Mayor Kobayashi has demanded all dogs to be sent to Trash Island. On the island, a young boy named Atari sets out to find his lost dog, Spots, with the help of five other dogs... with many obstacles along the way.::Mike202
Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.::Fox Searchlight Pictures
